name: Flint Telecom Group
overview: Flint Telecom Group, Inc. operates as a telecoms technology and services organization with a portfolio of companies that deliver next-generation IP communications products and services. The company focuses on three segments: Telecom Software, Services, and Equipment; Prepaid Telecom Services; and Postpaid Telecom Services. The Telecom Software, Services, and Equipment segment delivers wireless IP and â€˜Cloudâ€™ based applications to multinational enterprises and telecom operators worldwide. The Prepaid Telecom Services segment engages in the provision and distribution of â€˜Integratedâ€™ prepaid calling and cellular products to ethnic populations in the United States and Internationally. The Postpaid Telecom Services segment provides â€˜white labelâ€™ IP technologies for VoIP and Wireless services aimed at specialist operators in the United States and Internationally. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Overland Park, Kansas.
